name: Failed Login Attempt
description: Detects common patterns indicating a failed login attempt.

name: Access Denied
description: Triggers when a user or process is denied access to a resource.

name: SQL Injection Attempt
description: Identifies potential SQL injection attempts in log entries.

name: Port Scan Detected
description: Alerts on logs indicating a port scan activity.

name: Unusual High Traffic
description: Detects logs related to unusually high network traffic or DoS attacks.
